name: Uno Space
shortDescription: A social UNO-style card game set in a cosmic theme with multiplayer gameplay (AI bots) and engaging mechanics.
fullDescription:
Uno Space is an engaging card game inspired by the legendary UNO format, set against a space-themed backdrop. Players match cards by number or color, use special action cards, and compete in fun and strategic rounds.

Key Features:
- Multiplayer mode with AI bots simulating real opponents
- Single player / AI mode
- Color & number matching mechanics with special cards (Skip, Reverse, Draw Two, Wild)
- In-game shop & purchases
- Ad integration (banner, interstitial)
- Clean UI and smooth animations
- Easy to reskin / customize

Uno Space gives players a familiar yet fresh twist to classic UNO, wrapped in a cosmic aesthetic.
